data.actual_result: Still can log in, can even post reactions.
data.expected_result: The user should not even be able to connect to discord.
data.short_description: Users banned from discord; that were already logged in the app before can still see the chat and post reactions.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get an account banned from Discord. - After being banned, launch the app. - It will log you in, and you will be able to see message. You will be even able to post reactions, even if they take a few hours to get posted for some reasons.
